name: Simple-realistic Underwater VR
description:
Simple Realistic Underwater VR is a simple interactive native VR experience.  We can enjoy the beautiful realistic underwater scenery in VR. I made this for Oculus PCVR (Rift-S) but also compatible with other PCVR HMD (Index, VIVE, Pimax, Reverb G2, etc.) via OpenXR, or Oculus Quest/Quest2 via Oculus Link/Air-Link.

Commands keys controller : 
- Right-hand controller stick : teleport movement
- Left-hand controller stick : snap rotation
- Left-hand controller menu button : game menu (Restart game, Exit game)
- Left/Right trigger button : activate aim laser pointer
- Left/Right grip button : grab/interactive with objects (e.g starfish).
- F11 keyboard button : toggle full-screen / windowed mode in preview screen (PC monitor)

Tips:
- You can do "starfish boomerang" attack by grab starfish and throwing it as strong as you can! ;)
- To save your PC resource, you may toggle the preview in your PC Monitor screen to windowed mode (by pressing F11 keyboard button).

This project is still under development, I'm still work on it from my spare-time during my busy daily jobs.
Therefore, if you like this early state of my interactive VR demo please consider to donate for support me. Your support will make my motivation going stronger ;)

Happy gaming and cheers,

Chris

ps. if you don't have VR HMD and you want to enjoy this scene with any regular flat-screen monitor; you may download the interactive demo (2D version ~ Non-VR edition) from here:
https://crubino.itch.io/simple-realistic-underwater-preview
